summary: TRANSMISSION DISENGAGES WHEN ACCELERATING.  ALSO, TRANSMISSION FALLS OUT OF GEAR CAUSING UNEXPECTED LOSS OF POWER.  DEALERSHIP ADJUSTED BASE IDLE OF THE ENGINE THE FIRST TIME I TOOK IT IN FOR THIS PROBLEM.  TRANSMISSION TOTAL FAILURE AT 24000 MILES.  REPLACED TRANSMISSION AND HAD THE SAME PROBLEM THREE WEEKS LATER.  POWER LOSS WHEN TURNING LEFT IN THE MIDDLE OF THE INTERSECTION, BARELY AVOIDED COLLISION.  I DO NOT TAKE MY CHILDREN IN THIS CAR FOR FEAR OF POWER FAILURE.    *NLM
